origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'HuaweiAPI.get_supply_chain_risk_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves supply chain risk data for a specified company over a given number of years, focusing on specific advanced manufacturing technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., Huawei.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to retrieve data for.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific advanced manufacturing technology, e.g., 5G equipment, smart terminals.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'risk_data', 'description': 'The supply chain risk data for the specified company and technology.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 HuaweiAPI.get_supply_chain_risk_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Huawei', 'years'是'5', 'technology'是'5G equipment'.
